Data: Given the user is at path "WEB FG/ListofProject /Active_tab/"
Expected Result: Then modal opens and "Save As" defaults to "Active"

Data: Given the user is at path "WEB FG/ListofProject /Active_tab/" AND Copy Modal is open AND Save as is set "Active"
Action: When the user selects Save as "Template"

Data: Given the user is at path "WEB FG/ListofProject /Active_tab/" AND Copy Modal is open AND Save as is set "Template"
Action: When the user sets "Save as" = Active
Expected Result: Then the status dropdown is visible with allowed statuses

Data: Given the user is at path "WEB FG/ListofProject /Active_tab/" AND Copy Modal is open AND Save as is set "Active"
Action: When the user sets "Save as" = Template
Expected Result: Then the status dropdown is hidden

Data: Given the user is at path "WEB FG/ListofProject /Template_tab" AND Copy Modal is open AND Save as is set "Active"
Action: When the user sets "Save as" = Template
Expected Result: Then the status dropdown is hidden

Data: Given the user is at path "WEB FG/ListofProject /Template_tab/" AND Copy Modal is open AND Save as is set "Template"
Action: When the user sets "Save as" = Active
Expected Result: Then the status dropdown is visible with allowed statuses

Data: Given Copy Modal is open AND "Save As" = Active (no matter if starting project is a Template or Active)
Expected Result: Then the option "Archived" is not available

Data: Given Copy Modal is open AND User is starting from a non-template project with status "On Hold"
Expected Result: Then the default status in the dropdown is "On Hold"

Data: Given Copy Modal is open AND User is starting from a Template project
Expected Result: Then the default status in the dropdown is "In Progress"

Data: Given the Copy Modal is open AND copy options list is displayed on the modal (no matter what is the project type User is starting from)
Expected Result: Then "Copy Entire Project" appears before "Phase & Task Structure"

Data: Given the user is on the Copy modal with "Save as" = Template (no matter what is the project type User is starting from)
Action: When User views the "Type of Copy" section
Expected Result: Then "Exclude" and "Clear Data" are checked and cannot be changed

Data: Given User is on a FG/WEB/Template project
Action: When opening the project menu, at Hamburger Menu
Expected Result: Then the "Participants" menu item is hidden

Data: Given User is on a FG/WEB/Template project
Action: When viewing Settings > Issues > Procore Integration
Expected Result: Then the UI shows the connection is unavailable and/or only disconnect logic applies

Data: Given a Template project exists in Company and User is on Administration Section
Action: When User access to Administration > My Company > API Access
Expected Result: Then that Template project does not appear in the API projects list

Data: Given the user is at path "WEB FG/ListofProject /Template_tab"
Action: When opening the "Options" menu for a Template project
Expected Result: Then the "Watch" option is not displayed in the menu

Data: Given the user is at path "WEB FG/ListofProject /Active_tab"
Action: When opening the "Options" menu for an Active project
Expected Result: Then the "Watch" option is present (unchanged behavior)

Data: Given a Template project exists in Company and User is on Administration Section
Action: When the user opens the Company-level Dashboard and views the "Watched Projects" widget
Expected Result: Then the Template project is not listed there

Data: Given the User is on Procore
Action: When he acess to the list of embedded Project AND he search for a Project "Template" type
Expected Result: Then Template isn't in the list
